objects.text:
• Durable synthetic leather
• Spacious design for everyday use
• Gold hardware accents
• Size: 10.9'' L x 4'' W x 12.4'' H

product_details.description: ALDO womens Durable handbag This spaciously stylish tote bag boasts ample storage space and shoulder strap for extra utility Made of synthetic materials 1 compartment: stylish and functional to store your cell phone, wallet, or any other essential you need near by Medium: the perfect medium sized handbag for everyday life Size: 10.9'' L x 4'' W x 12.4'' H (28cm x 10.5cm x 32cm) Fabric type - Faux Leather ** Origin - Imported ** Closure type - Zipper ** Lining - Synthetic ** Country of Origin - Cambodia **

banner_details:
This banner design features a clean, sophisticated layout with a luxury appeal. The background incorporates angular geometric shapes and subtle pattern overlays, creating depth and elegance. The heading (`heading`) is prominently positioned using a bold golden typeface to command attention. Below it, a refined subheading (`subheading`) introduces the brand in a classic serif font. A decorative line (`decorative_line`) separates the text visually from a feature list (`description`) that outlines the product benefits. The price (`price`) is bold and eye-catching in gold, enhancing visibility. A rectangular button (`cta_background`) with dark brown text (`cta`) invites action. A high-quality image of the handbag (`product_image`) occupies the right side for visual balance.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Brown (#3D2314)
- Warm Tan (#CEA673)
- Metallic Gold (#D4AF37)
- Soft Beige (#F1E5D1)
- White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image showcases a sophisticated handbag in a warm, muted camel brown (#A9746E), which forms the dominant color. Accents in polished gold (#D4AF37) are smartly used across metallic hardware, including the chains, clasps, and branding elements, adding a sense of luxury and elegance. These golden elements are strategically placed to catch light, drawing attention subtly without overshadowing the overall tone. The brown surface features a finely textured finish, enhancing depth while maintaining uniformity. For an advertisement banner, an elegant palette of camel brown (#A9746E), gold (#D4AF37), soft beige (#F5EBDD), and cream white (#FAF9F6) would offer harmony and refinement.
